resources.string: Please enter the personal information of the person who would like to be tested
Do you suffer from a cough?
Do you suffer from shortness of breath or difficulty breathing?
Have you had a temperature of 38°C or higher?
Have you had any other symptoms?
Do you have underlying health conditions?
Do you take any medication regularly?
Please answer a few questions about your current health condition and medical history
"Please provide the personal information of the people in your household to let us know if additional tests are needed "
I confirm that the information given in this form is true, complete and accurate
Not counting yourself, how many people are in your household?
We at TestCOVID provide you a simple and convenient way to order a COVID-19 test directly to your home!
Please notice – The tests are distributed according to the available tests and the symptoms you provided\nBe patient, we will contact you soon.
